InformativeText.Abstract: This service exposes a device's current transmit power level when in a connection.
InformativeText.Summary: The Tx Power service is instantiated as a Primary Service. There is only one instance of the Tx Power service on a device. There is exactly one instance of the Tx Power Level characteristic

Dependencies.Dependency: This service has no dependencies on other GATT-based services.

ErrorCode.name: Replace table by: This service does not define any application error codes that are used in Attribute Protocol.
